summary:
I'm a dedicated, proactive, organized, ambitious and eager for knowledge person.

I'm interested in many subjects but the ones I dedicate the most time to are photography and the photo/video editing that comes with it, travelling, meeting new people and having a good time with friends and, of course, computer science and engineering.

My ambition is to work abroad in a big and accomplished company and make a name for myself as an engineer in the field of Cyber Security.

profile_positions.title: Security Analyst @ CISO Security Operations Center EU

profile_positions.description:
• Development of a Cyber Threat Intelligence tool that receives Threat Actors MITRE ATT&CK Navigator Layers and maps with a priority scoring to MITRE ATT&CK Framework Mitigations and Data Sources and NIST 800-53 Risk Management Controls
• Development of a Post-quantum Cryptography environment using the OpenQuantumSafe toolkit showcasing quantum security features in real world scenarios (WebServer, VPN, etc)
• Development of an automation pipeline for Cyber use-cases life-cycle management on Splunk Enterprise

profile_positions.title: Intern @ NATO Cyber Security Centre
Network and Security Engineer @ Core Networks

profile_positions.description:
Network and Security Engineer working on Telco and Utilities Industries solutions focused on core network technologies, routing and switching.

• Network devices monitoring with Model-driven Telemetry
• Zero-touch Provisioning for large-scale network deployments
 - Development of a modular pipeline using Ansible, Python and other relevant technologies
• On-site firewall deployment
• Network Management platform integration (PRTG, Cisco Prime)
• Remote site deployment and configuration for REN
